content.description:
LEFT © The Metropolitan Museum of Art / Art Resource, NY

RIGHT © Smithsonian American Art Museum, Washington, DC / Art Resource, NY
content.question: Which of the following statements is true about both paintings?

choices.label: They reflect longing for a lost homeland.
They reflect a transcendental vision of nature.
They incited outrage from government officials.

content.answer: They reflect a transcendental vision of nature.

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
